meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Uzbekistan.
meanings.sent1: In Uzbekistan, you can buy many things with just one tyiyn.
meanings.sent2: I found a tyiyn on the street and used it to buy a snack.
meanings.sent3: The tyiyn rolled away, causing a funny chase in the market.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a tyiyn, small but valuable.
meanings.sent5: The shiny tyiyn caught my eye among the coins.

meanings.definition: A type of coin used in Central Asia.
meanings.sent1: The tyiyn is a common coin in Central Asia.
meanings.sent2: I collected different tyiyn coins from my travels.
meanings.sent3: The tyiyn coin made a clinking sound as it fell into the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a newly minted tyiyn.
meanings.sent5: The old tyiyn had a worn-out image of a historical figure.

meanings.sent1: The price was listed in tyiyns in Tajikistan.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for Tajikistani tyiyn.
meanings.sent3: The tyiyns jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like valuable tyiyns of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The market bustled with vendors calling out prices in tyiyns.
